casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Beane.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Beane (1995), 72 Ohio St.3d 480.]

(No. 95-395 Submitted April 4, 1995 Decided July 12, 1995.) *482Geoffrey Stem, Disciplinary Counsel, and Sally Ann Steuk, Assistant Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. Thomas V. Ferrero, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Having reviewed the record in this cause, we concur in the board’s findings of misconduct and its recommendation. Respondent is hereby suspended from the practice of law in Ohio for a period of six months, and he is afforded no credit for time served under prior suspensions. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
